creator: apache@sedivy.com
text:
If Apache cannot start or find a script following error is generated (in the 
error log):

[date] [error] [client] script not found or unable to stat: [filename], 
[referer]

I think 'stat' should be 'start'

creator: nd@perlig.de
text:
Nope. The "stat" comes from the stat(2) system call.

Thanks anyway for your care and for using Apache!
